identified-content.classifier: Top/News/Health/Diseases, Conditions, and Health Topics/Medicine and Health

abstract.p: Group of 14 graduate students and faculty from Korea's Kyungsan University attend conference on long-term care and public health issues as part of Pace University's expansion of its partnerships with overseas universities (S)

block.p: As part of Pace University's expansion of its partnerships with overseas universities, 14 graduate students and faculty members from Kyungsan University in Korea spent last week at the Lubin Graduate Center at Pace attending a conference on long-term care and public health issues. ''This is part of Pace's recognition of the increasing globalization of education,'' said Dr. Joseph Ryan, chairman of the Department of Public Administration. ''Pace is trying to be on the forefront; we'll be offering more courses on line that the Korean students can take while they're in Korea.''
